name: bnns
short_description: BNNS is a research tool for interactive training of  artificial neural networks based on the Response Function Plots visualization method.  It enables users to simulate, visualize and interact in the learning process of a Multi-Layer Perceptron on tasks which have a 2D character.  Tasks like the famous two-spirals task or classification of satellite image data.
summary: Research tool for interactive training of artificial neural networks.
